content: **crocheted shawl in drops alpaca piece is crocheted top down with lace pattern ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern z-912 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **size** width at the top approx 148 cm length on the middle approx 59 cm **materials** drops alpaca from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 250 g colour 7233 olive **crochet gauge** 22 treble crochets in width and 12 row vertically = 10 x 10 cm crochet hook drops crochet hook size 3 5 mm hook size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger hook if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller hook
